title: How to write a leadership influence for scholarship - Quora

response.answer_text: For starters, use better grammar—I’m not sure I understand what you are asking but if you are asking for advice on how to apply for a scholarship, I think bad grammar may count against you—and I don’t know what a “leadership influence” is.
Do you want to write a proposal about leadership to apply for a scholarship? I’m not sure what your question is about? Grammar and spelling are very important if you are going to write a proposal.
